thread.section_title: PaintYourLife.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PaintYourLife.com | www.paintyourlife.com | 3 of 21
thread.title: Tyler Y.

author: Tyler Y.
title: Tyler Y.
text: This process couldn't have been easier. This was my first time purchasing art this way, so I wasn't sure how it would go. From selecting an artist, to selecting the medium, pictures you choose for the artist to use, and the quick edits that can be made to your picture, this process is easily navigated by anyone who can read email and click a link to the webpage. What matters most, of course, is the final project. It was incredible and I don't think I can even think of one thing I would have the company do differently. Having a unique piece of art featuring loved ones is, to me, priceless.
